title: Ticket #5783: Add example(s) of using hooks with condor_job_router
description:
Email on htcondor-users: 

  On 7/12/2016 5:17 PM, Caballero, Jose wrote:
  >
  >>
  >>> I am very interested in learning about HTCondor-CE using code hooks.
  >>
  >> Besides the source code, I assume you found the section on router hook in the manual at https://is.gd/VGEXn7 …
  >>
  >
  > Yeah, I found that. What I don’t find anywhere is an example on how to use them :)
  >
  >


  Cc-ing Kent, who is Mr Manual these days, hopefully he can add an
  example or two.


  Meanwhile you can ask on htcondor-users and/or OSG for examples from
  various sites...


  best
  Todd
creator: wenger
